select.if: select b.id,b.title,b.img_url from t_blog b inner join t_user u on b.create_user_id = u.id where b.img_url is not null and b.title != '' order by b.id desc limit #{num}
select b.id,b.title,b.img_url from t_blog b inner join t_user u on b.create_user_id = u.id where b.id < #{last_blog_id} and b.img_url is not null and b.title != '' order by b.id desc limit #{num}
